attacks.name: Overclock
attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Timeless GX
attacks.effect: Take another turn after this one. (Skip the between-turns step.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
